body:
This pull request adds openfoam-org versions 6 and 7 and a variant +metis for linking metis.

The version number change from 5.0 to 6 and 7 is due to the change made by OpenFOAM developers on their repository naming convention.

The included patch contains changes made by [this commit](https://github.com/OpenFOAM/OpenFOAM-7/commit/ef33cf38ac9b811072a8970c71fbda35a90f6641). Without it the +int64 variant will not build correctly.
title: openfoam-org: Adding openfoam-org versions 6 and 7 and a metis variant.
